definition: (computing) actual parameter/argument/abbr. for 實際參數|实际参数[shi2 ji4 can1 shu4]
to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: The parameters are defined as arguments that have to be passed by the report.
sentences.chinese: 这些参数被定义为必须通过报告传递的实参。

sentences.english: In the calling code, do not enclose the argument in parentheses in the argument list.
sentences.chinese: 在调用代码中，不要将实参列表中的实参放在括号内。

sentences.english: In the calling code, do not enclose the argument in parentheses in the argument list.
sentences.chinese: 在调用代码中，不要将实参列表中的实参放在括号内。

sentences.english: You need to check the arguments before proceeding with the logic of each method.
sentences.chinese: 你需要在继续进行每一个程序的逻辑之前检查实参。

sentences.english: There is at least one argument for which the match is better than the match provided by any other viable function.
sentences.chinese: 其每个实参的匹配都不劣于其他可行函数需要的匹配。

sentences.english: This is, of course, if the contract states the preconditions for the arguments.
sentences.chinese: 当然，前提是合同规定了实参的先决条件。

sentences.english: It can create graphs by using command-line arguments to generate them from the data it has captured.
sentences.chinese: 它可以通过使用命令行实参根据捕捉的数据生成图形。

sentences.english: A default argument doesn't change the number of parameters.
sentences.chinese: 默认实参并没有改变形参的个数。

sentences.english: The match for each argument is no worse than the match required by any other viable function.
sentences.chinese: 其每个实参的匹配都不劣于其他可行函数需要的匹配。

sentences.english: Passing actual arguments of a too small size to a function.
sentences.chinese: 将很小的实参传递给函数。

definition: to pass an argument (computing)/abbr. for 傳遞參數|传递参数[chuan2 di4 can1 shu4]
